trans-unit.source: The type of an element in the controlled sequence.
trans-unit.target: 受控制序列中項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: Defines the interface for an STL/CLR [vector](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f90060d5-097a-4e9d-9a26-a634b5b9c6c2) object.
trans-unit.target: 定義 STL/CLR [vector](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f90060d5-097a-4e9d-9a26-a634b5b9c6c2) 物件的介面。

trans-unit.source: Replaces all elements in the container with the specified elements.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的項目取代容器中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::assign (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/945e2048-6c61-4701-b13c-8241cbee3fa1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: assign (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/945e2048-6c61-4701-b13c-8241cbee3fa1)。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration whose elements are to be inserted into the container.
trans-unit.target: 要將其項目插入至容器的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Replaces all elements in the container with the elements in the specified enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 以指定列舉中的項目取代容器中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::assign (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/945e2048-6c61-4701-b13c-8241cbee3fa1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: assign (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/945e2048-6c61-4701-b13c-8241cbee3fa1)。

trans-unit.source: The beginning position of the range of elements to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入之項目範圍的開頭位置。

trans-unit.source: The first position beyond the end of the range of elements to insert.
trans-unit.target: 超過要插入之項目範圍結尾的第一個位置。

trans-unit.source: Replaces all elements in the container with the elements between the given iterators.
trans-unit.target: 以指定之 Iterator 之間的項目取代容器中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::assign (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/945e2048-6c61-4701-b13c-8241cbee3fa1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: assign (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/945e2048-6c61-4701-b13c-8241cbee3fa1)。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to insert into the container.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至容器的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的元素值。

trans-unit.source: Replaces all elements in the container with the specified number of elements that have given values.
trans-unit.target: 以具有指定值之指定數目的項目取代容器中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::assign (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/945e2048-6c61-4701-b13c-8241cbee3fa1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: assign (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/945e2048-6c61-4701-b13c-8241cbee3fa1)。

trans-unit.source: The position of the element to access.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的項目之位置。

trans-unit.source: Accesses an element at a specified position in the container.
trans-unit.target: 存取容器中位於指定位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element of the controlled sequence at position <paramref name="_Pos" />.
trans-unit.target: 位於 <paramref name="_Pos" /> 之受控制序列的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::at (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9af9f829-48b8-4906-ba4a-b43454acb2c7).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: at (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9af9f829-48b8-4906-ba4a-b43454acb2c7)。

trans-unit.source: Accesses the last element of the container.
trans-unit.target: 存取容器的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The last element of the controlled sequence, which must be non-empty.
trans-unit.target: 受控制序列的最後一個項目，此序列必須為非空白序列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::back (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5edb3fcc-74c5-4f04-b8dd-edab49ba45a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: back (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5edb3fcc-74c5-4f04-b8dd-edab49ba45a0)。

trans-unit.source: Accesses the last element of the container.
trans-unit.target: 存取容器的最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The last element of the controlled sequence, which must be non-empty.
trans-unit.target: 受控制序列的最後一個項目，此序列必須為非空白序列。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::back_item (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9658ffa8-7bde-4242-9ed9-ca42be0d1433).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector::back_item (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9658ffa8-7bde-4242-9ed9-ca42be0d1433)。

trans-unit.source: Designates the beginning of the controlled sequence.
trans-unit.target: 指定受控制序列的開頭。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::begin (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cdf854-0770-4334-a3dd-7f4d728a42bd).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: begin (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9cdf854-0770-4334-a3dd-7f4d728a42bd)。

trans-unit.source: Reports the size of allocated storage for the container.
trans-unit.target: 報告容器配置儲存區的大小。

trans-unit.source: The storage that is currently allocated to hold the controlled sequence, a value at least as large as <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.IVector`1.size" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前所配置用以保存受控制序列的儲存區，值至少和 <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualC.StlClr.IVector`1.size" /> 一樣大。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::capacity (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f82d8da9-8b4d-4288-8d18-8e9ca5911d87).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: capacity (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f82d8da9-8b4d-4288-8d18-8e9ca5911d87)。

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the container.
trans-unit.target: 移除容器中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::clear (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ed20ec8-3089-4c36-b68f-1b51c639041f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: clear (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ed20ec8-3089-4c36-b68f-1b51c639041f)。

trans-unit.source: Tests whether the container has no elements.
trans-unit.target: 測試容器是否沒有項目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the container has no elements; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果容器沒有項目則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::empty (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c09fc4a3-bd79-4458-9a36-1d9c82ac36b1).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: empty (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c09fc4a3-bd79-4458-9a36-1d9c82ac36b1)。

trans-unit.source: Designates the end of the controlled sequence.
trans-unit.target: 指定受控制序列的結尾。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::end (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21fcaf1b-7f14-4dc4-a312-fa30e631ea0d).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: end (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/21fcaf1b-7f14-4dc4-a312-fa30e631ea0d)。

trans-unit.source: Removes elements from specified positions in the container.
trans-unit.target: 從容器中的指定位置移除項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::erase (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/624905eb-83c0-499b-a07a-c10aebd7acc3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: erase (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/624905eb-83c0-499b-a07a-c10aebd7acc3)。

trans-unit.source: The position of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除之項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Removes the single element of the controlled sequence that is pointed to by <paramref name="_Where" />.
trans-unit.target: 移除由 <paramref name="_Where" /> 所指向之受控制序列的單一項目。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::erase (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/624905eb-83c0-499b-a07a-c10aebd7acc3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: erase (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/624905eb-83c0-499b-a07a-c10aebd7acc3)。

trans-unit.source: The beginning of the range of elements to erase.
trans-unit.target: 要清除之項目範圍的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The first position beyond the range of elements to erase.
trans-unit.target: 超過要清除之項目範圍的第一個位置。

trans-unit.source: Removes the elements of the controlled sequence in the range <c>[</c><paramref name="_First_iter" /><c>,</c><paramref name="_Last_iter" /><c>)</c>.
trans-unit.target: 移除範圍 <c>[</c><paramref name="_First_iter" /><c>,</c><paramref name="_Last_iter" /><c>)</c> 中受控制序列的項目。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::erase (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/624905eb-83c0-499b-a07a-c10aebd7acc3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: erase (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/624905eb-83c0-499b-a07a-c10aebd7acc3)。

trans-unit.source: Accesses the first element of the container.
trans-unit.target: 存取容器的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The first element of the controlled sequence, which must be non-empty.
trans-unit.target: 受控制序列的第一個項目，此序列必須為非空白序列。

trans-unit.source: Accesses the first element of the container.
trans-unit.target: 存取容器的第一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The first element of the controlled sequence, which must be non-empty.
trans-unit.target: 受控制序列的第一個項目，此序列必須為非空白序列。

trans-unit.source: Adds elements to the container at a specified position.
trans-unit.target: 將項目新增至容器的指定位置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::insert (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f240cabf-f9d1-40c1-9cfb-975a90955546).

trans-unit.source: The position in the container before which to insert.
trans-unit.target: 容器中的位置，插入此位置前。

trans-unit.source: The enumeration to insert into the container.
trans-unit.target: 要插入容器中的列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the sequence that is designated by an enumerator into the container.
trans-unit.target: 將列舉程式所指定的序列插入容器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::insert (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f240cabf-f9d1-40c1-9cfb-975a90955546).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: insert (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f240cabf-f9d1-40c1-9cfb-975a90955546)。

trans-unit.source: The position in the container before which to insert.
trans-unit.target: 容器中的位置，插入此位置前。

trans-unit.source: The beginning position of the range to insert into the container.
trans-unit.target: 要插入容器之範圍的開頭位置。

trans-unit.source: The first position beyond the range to insert into the container.
trans-unit.target: 超過要插入容器之範圍的第一個位置。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the sequence beginning with <paramref name="_First" /> and ending with the element preceding <paramref name="_Last" /> into the container.
trans-unit.target: 將以 <paramref name="_First" /> 為開頭和以 <paramref name="_Last" /> 之前的項目為結尾的序列插入容器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::insert (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f240cabf-f9d1-40c1-9cfb-975a90955546).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: insert (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f240cabf-f9d1-40c1-9cfb-975a90955546)。

trans-unit.source: The position in the container before which to insert.
trans-unit.target: 容器中的位置，插入此位置前。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to insert into the container.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至容器的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element to insert into the container.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至容器中的項目值。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified number of the given elements into the container.
trans-unit.target: 將指定數目的指定項目插入容器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::insert (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f240cabf-f9d1-40c1-9cfb-975a90955546).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: insert (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f240cabf-f9d1-40c1-9cfb-975a90955546)。

trans-unit.source: The position in the container before which to insert.
trans-unit.target: 容器中的位置，插入此位置前。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element to insert into the container.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至容器中的項目值。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified value into the container.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的值插入容器。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::insert (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f240cabf-f9d1-40c1-9cfb-975a90955546).

trans-unit.source: The position of the element to access.
trans-unit.target: 要存取的項目之位置。

trans-unit.source: Accesses an element at a specified position in the container.
trans-unit.target: 存取容器中位於指定位置的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element at position <paramref name="_Pos" />.
trans-unit.target: 位於 <paramref name="_Pos" /> 的項目。

trans-unit.source: Removes the last element from the container.
trans-unit.target: 從容器移除最後一個項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of the element to insert into the container.
trans-unit.target: 要插入至容器中的項目值。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new element to the end of the container.
trans-unit.target: 將新的項目新增至容器結尾。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::push_back (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4a4c302b-e29f-4b68-b759-2f831814d896).

trans-unit.source: Designates the beginning of the reversed controlled sequence.
trans-unit.target: 指定反向受控制序列的開頭。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::rbegin (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fad410b9-fe79-4820-9be5-6b7e0219a1af).

trans-unit.source: Designates the end of the reversed controlled sequence.
trans-unit.target: 指定反向受控制序列的結尾。

trans-unit.source: An iterator.
trans-unit.target: 迭代器。

trans-unit.source: The new minimum capacity of the container.
trans-unit.target: 新的容器最小容量。

trans-unit.source: Reserves storage to ensure the minimum growth capacity for the container.
trans-unit.target: 保留儲存區，以確保容器最小的成長容量。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::reserve (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1d5ede9-9628-4b55-95ec-f087a57205f2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: reserve (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1d5ede9-9628-4b55-95ec-f087a57205f2)。

trans-unit.source: Changes the number of elements that the container can hold.
trans-unit.target: 變更容器可保存的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::resize (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3556fbc-67d9-463a-9ffc-cb43ee15657f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: resize (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3556fbc-67d9-463a-9ffc-cb43ee15657f)。

trans-unit.source: The new size of the controlled sequence.
trans-unit.target: 受控制序列的新大小。

trans-unit.source: Changes the number of elements in the container to the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 將容器中的項目數目變更為指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::resize (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3556fbc-67d9-463a-9ffc-cb43ee15657f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: resize (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3556fbc-67d9-463a-9ffc-cb43ee15657f)。

trans-unit.source: The new size of the controlled sequence.
trans-unit.target: 受控制序列的新大小。

trans-unit.source: The value of the elements to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入之項目的值。

trans-unit.source: Changes the number of elements in the container to the specified size.
trans-unit.target: 將容器中的項目數目變更為指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: If the new size is larger than the old size, the method appends elements that have value <paramref name="_Val" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的大小大於舊的大小，此方法會附加具有 <paramref name="_Val" /> 值的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::resize (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3556fbc-67d9-463a-9ffc-cb43ee15657f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: resize (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a3556fbc-67d9-463a-9ffc-cb43ee15657f)。

trans-unit.source: Counts the number of elements in the container.
trans-unit.target: 計算容器中的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: The length of the controlled sequence.
trans-unit.target: 受控制序列的長度。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [vector::size (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d2a156e-5871-4441-9307-21a20cd1430f).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[vector:: size (STL/CLR)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d2a156e-5871-4441-9307-21a20cd1430f)。

trans-unit.source: The container with which to swap contents.
trans-unit.target: 要和其交換內容的容器。

trans-unit.source: Swaps the contents of two containers.
